mean_cn: n. 保险；保险费；保险业
mean_en: an agreement in which a person makes regular payments to a company and the company promises to pay money if the person is injured or dies, or to pay money equal to the value of something (such as a house or car) if it is damaged, lost, or stolen
word_etyma: insur保证 + ance名词后缀 → insurance 保险
sentence: I bought insurance for my car.
